Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now it's time for the <RED>Critter Festival
Opening Ceremony</RED>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The rules are simple. Whoever catches
the most bugs from the <BLUE>start</BLUE> to the 
<BLUE>results announcement</BLUE> will be the winner.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please note that only bugs count,
except for bugs received as gifts.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
The winner will receive the following
prize: <GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>.
Good luck!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
The winner will receive the following
prizes: <GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN> and <GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN>.
<PAGE>
Good luck!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
The winner will receive the following
prizes: <GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>, <GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN>...
<PAGE>
and <GREEN><ITEMNAME2></GREEN> blueprints. Good luck!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now, let the Critter Festival begin!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now it's time for the <RED>Critter
Festival Results</RED>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
First I'd like to thank everyone for
coming out today.
<PAGE>
I've seen a lot of people with bug
cages during the competition period, so
everyone must have enjoyed themselves.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now here are the results that everyone
is waiting for.
<PAGE>
The winner is...

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHARANAME0>! Congratulations! Let's
give them a round of applause!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
In second place we have <CHARANAME0>, 
<CHARANAME1> takes third, and in
fourth place is <CHARANAME2>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now it's time for the awards ceremony.
<CHARANAME0>, please step forward.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations! Here is your prize: 
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>.
Keep on catching critters!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations! Here are your prizes:
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN> and
<GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN>.
<PAGE>
Keep on catching critters!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations! Here are your prizes:
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN> and...
<PAGE>
<GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN> and
<GREEN><ITEMNAME2></GREEN> blueprints.
Keep on catching critters!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
And that concludes the 
<RED>Critter Festival Results</RED>. Thank you
all for coming!
